DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety bimatoprost sustained-release ( SR ) patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . The study include 12-month treatment period 8-month extended follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Bimatoprost Sustained-Release ( SR ) Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis either openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension eye eye require IOPlowering treatment . Previous enrollment Allergan Study 192024041D Eye surgery ( include cataract surgery ) and/or eye laser surgery within past 6 month study eye Anticipated need laser eye surgery within first 52 week study duration History glaucoma surgery
